description: Imparts a 1-frame explosion impulse on physics objects, similar to a grenade.

params.name: center
description: The world position of the center of the explosion.

params.name: outer radius
description: The radius beyond which the force is zero.

params.name: inner radius
description: The radius within which the force is maximum.

params.name: magnitude
description: The strength of the force. 1 = the default explosion.
